name: In re GUARDIANSHIP OF Howard McALLISTER. Appeal of Howard McALLISTER

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: In re GUARDIANSHIP OF Howard McALLISTER. Appeal of Howard McALLISTER.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert S. Mirin, Harrisburg, for H. McAllister.
John H. Broujos, Carlisle, for Sunee McAllister.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 292
In re GUARDIANSHIP OF Howard McALLISTER. Appeal of Howard McALLISTER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
Robert S. Mirin, Harrisburg, for H. McAllister.
John H. Broujos, Carlisle, for Sunee McAllister.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
